short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can enhance your productivity by combining all your shortcuts to your most used apps on a daily basis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ALL THE APPS  YOU NEED ON YOUR DAILY BASIS IN ONE TAB 

Every new tab you open will have these apps set as a default.

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made. The extension changes the new tab background.

By installing Apps4all, you agree to the User Terms and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Weave Innovative website:

User Terms: https://weave-innovative.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://weave-innovative.com/privacypolicy

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
